input_text:
Job Title: Dishwasher - Luke's 32 Bridge

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
POSITION SUMMARY: Dishwasher will be responsible for maintaining cleanliness and sanitation of all cutlery, glassware, food machines, etc. It is essential that the dishwasher maintain the dishwashing station in a pristine and safe manner. The ideal candidate believes in showing up on time for work, providing other employees with assistance in the kitchen as needed, and following all sanitary and health-related protocols. All duties are to be performed in accordance with Company policies, practices, and procedures, within the framework of TC Restaurant Group principles.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS OF THE POSITION INCLUDE, BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:

 Organize all dirty dishes, glassware, cooking utensils, etc. into a dishwasher Ensure that the water in the dishwasher is taken out on an hourly basis Responsible for rolling/unrolling mats in order to clean floors Operate the industrial dishwasher Wash glassware and other implements by hand when necessary Empty and clean all trash receptacles Clean iced tea, coffee and other specified machines daily Rotate dishes to reduce wear and tear on resources Clean dish storage - Follow sanitation policies at all times Provide assistance to prep cook and other kitchen staff as needed, especially during peak times Perform opening, closing and side work Clean up spills or broken glassware immediately Report any sanitation or janitorial issues to appropriate party Performs other job-related duties as assigned. 

EDUCATION/WORKING KNOWLEDGE/ EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS:

 Position may be labor intensive and may require heavy lifting Excellent critical thinking and time management skills Ability to operate industrial machinery and carry loads up to 25 lbs Willingness to work in hot, humid environment and on your feet for 8-hour shifts This position requires the employee to: sit, climb, stoop, kneel The employee must tolerate long periods of being on their feet - Must be able to lift up to 25 pounds and/or move objects up to 50 pounds Be able to multitask due to the high volume of the restaurant

IN ADDITION TO THE AFOREMENTIONED ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS, THE DISHWASHER WILL BE EVALUATED ON THE FOLLOWING LEADERSHIP QUALITIES:

 Accountability Adherence to Policy Attitude Confidentiality Development Job skills knowledge Judgment Organization Productivity Punctuality Quality of work Teamwork Verbal communication Working relationships Written communication

TC Restaurant Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Dishwasher - Luke's 32 Bridge
output_json.summary: Responsible for maintaining cleanliness and sanitation of dishes and kitchen equipment.
job_responsibilities: Organize all dirty dishes for the dishwasher
Ensure water in the dishwasher is emptied hourly
Wash glassware and other implements by hand when necessary
Clean iced tea, coffee, and other specified machines daily
Rotate dishes to reduce wear and tear
Provide assistance to prep cook and other kitchen staff
Clean up spills or broken glassware immediately
Perform opening, closing, and side work
Clean up spills or broken glassware immediately
Perform other job-related duties as assigned
output_json.physical_requirements: Must be able to sit, climb, stoop, kneel. Employee must tolerate long periods of being on their feet. Must be able to lift up to 25 pounds and/or move objects up to 50 pounds. Must be able to multitask due to high volume.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: TC Restaurant Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

other.content: Position may be labor intensive and may require heavy lifting. Excellent critical thinking and time management skills. Ability to operate industrial machinery and carry loads up to 25 lbs. Willingness to work in hot, humid environment and on your feet for 8-hour shifts.
